staffdatamodel

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • observertestharness.IObserverFunctions
      • staffdatamodel.Request
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IObserver, ISubject

    public class Request
extends IObserverFunctions
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class to hold details for a leave request Note: leaveType is read-only
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Request()
      Default (empty) constructor creates a PENDING leave request for ANNUAL leave of one day starting today with no special reason for the leave.
      Request(java.util.Date startDate, int duration, java.lang.String specialReason)
      Constructor that creates a PENDING leave request for SPECIAL leave for a special reason.
      Request(LeaveType leaveType, java.util.Date startDate, int duration)
      Constructor that creates a PENDING leave request with no special reason for the leave request.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void approve()
      This method marks this leave request as APPROVED by the employee's line manager
      void decline()
      This method marks this leave request as DECLINED by the employee's line manager

      Accessor method that retrieves the date on which this leave request start as a string suitable for display in the format dd/MM/yyyy

    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request()
        Default (empty) constructor creates a PENDING leave request for ANNUAL leave of one day starting today with no special reason for the leave.

      • Request

        public Request(LeaveType leaveType,
       java.util.Date startDate,
       int duration)
        Constructor that creates a PENDING leave request with no special reason for the leave request. The leave requests type, start date and duration will be set from the provided parameters.
        Parameters:
        leaveType - - LeaveType enumerated value describing the type of leave requested
        startDate - - A Date on which the leave request will start
        duration - - The duration in days that the employee will be absent

      • Request

        public Request(java.util.Date startDate,
       int duration,
       java.lang.String specialReason)
        Constructor that creates a PENDING leave request for SPECIAL leave for a special reason. The leave requests start date, duration and special reason will be set from the provided parameters
        Parameters:
        startDate - - A Date on which the leave request will start
        duration - - The duration in days that the employee will be absent
        specialReason - - String describing the special reason for the leave.

    • Method Detail

      • approve

        public void approve()
        This method marks this leave request as APPROVED by the employee's line manager

        public void reset()
        sets the status to pending

      • getDateAsString

        public java.lang.String getDateAsString()
        Accessor method that retrieves the date on which this leave request start as a string suitable for display in the format dd/MM/yyyy
        Returns:
        A String representing the date on which the leave starts.

      • getLeaveType

        public LeaveType getLeaveType()
        Accessor to retrieve the enumerated value representing the type of leave requested.
        Returns:
        the LeaveType enumerated value for this request

      • setLeaveType

        public void setLeaveType(LeaveType leaveType)
        Accessor to set the enumerated value representing the type of leave requested.
        Parameters:
        leaveType - the new LeaveType enumerated value to use for this request

      • getStatus

        public LeaveStatusType getStatus()
        Accessor to retrieve the current approval status for this leave request.
        Returns:
        the requests current status enumeration

      • setStartDate

        public void setStartDate(java.util.Date startDate)
        Accessor to set the date object encapsulating the date on which the leave is requested to start
        Parameters:
        startDate - the Date object representing the new date on which this leave request starts.

      • getDuration

        public int getDuration()
        Accessor to retrieve the duration (in days) of the leave request
        Returns:
        - int being the number of days the employee will be absent for

      • setDuration

        public void setDuration(int duration)
        Accessor to set the duration (in days) of the leave request
        Parameters:
        duration - - int being the number of days the employee will be absent for

      • getSpecialReason

        public java.lang.String getSpecialReason()
        Accessor to retrieve the string describing any special reasons for this leave request.
        Returns:
        A String describing any special circumstances associated with this request for leave.

      • setSpecialReason

        public void setSpecialReason(java.lang.String specialReason)
        Accessor to set the string describing any special reasons for this leave request.
        Parameters:
        specialReason - A String describing any special circumstances associated with this request for leave.
